page.body:
Pia Romano
CEO and HR

Pia started her career as a young gamekeeper on a Scottish country estate, before arriving in the USA in the 1990s. She realized that there was a valuable niche providing exotic food and meats to the more upscale restaurants of New York and the North East.

Pia is a visionary leader who has an incredible ability to network and connect the right people to the right niche. Although she has relied on gut instincts to move forward, she is extremely results oriented and politically savvy. She can move from the planning and analyzing stage directly to social interaction without missing a step.
